About-Paragraph: Tamilanexpress.ca is canada's largest tamil e-commerce organization of food industry. We try to keep up your emotional bond with home food, with vast choice of 15000 products to choose from and over 30 types of distinct services. Tamilan Express have set the bar for e-commerce footprint of sri lanka to bring it to canada. Inspired by the truly tamil tradition Tamilan Express welcomes you to be part of our family.
